thread.title: Former Managing Director of RadiumOne to become Gravity4's Managing Director of Northern Europe
thread.title_full: Former Managing Director of RadiumOne to become Gravity4's Managing Director of Northern Europe

author: admin
title: Former Managing Director of RadiumOne to become Gravity4's Managing Director of Northern Europe
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/9/2015 @ 11:18 AM   Gravity4 
SAN FRANCISCO, Sept. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Today, Gravity4 announced that it will welcome Tom Bang, former Managing Director at RadiumOne, to become Gravity4's Managing Director of Northern Europe. Bang will assume all roles and responsibilities to expand Gravity4's global presence into the European market as well as opening up 6 new offices in Europe. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150609/221871 
Tom Bang holds over 18 years of experience within the advertising space and has continued to make strides within the industry. At his most recent role, Bang was responsible for the launch of RadiumOne in Nordics focusing on relation building among publishers, networks, agencies, and direct brand advertisers. Beginning October 1st, 2015, Tom Bang will focus on growing Gravity4's European market expanding its unique offering to brands, agencies, and publishers throughout Northern Europe. 
"Upon first working with Chahal at my previous role, I was always excited by the innovation and vision he brought to the table. Today I'm excited to join Gravity4 and, once again, become a part of a company with a clear vision, and an excellent management team. With the speed at which Gravity4 operates, and being the only company with its unique offering made me realize the impact in bringing disruption as we build Gravity4 into a multi-billion dollar global company," said Tom Bang, Gravity4's Managing Director of Northern Europe. 
"It's an honor to re-partner with someone like Tom. His background matches exactly what we were looking for in a Managing Director as we expand globally. He's going to be a tremendous asset to our European customers, and I'm honored to be working with him by my side," said Gurbaksh Chahal, Chairman & CEO of Gravity4. 
Gravity4's Marketing Cloud offers a self-serve programmatic, native, and search platform for brands, agencies and publishers. Through its proprietary data management platform (DMP) using first-party data, and its Enterprise App Center, Gravity4 is able to connect advertisers with consumers across all consumer touch points. Recently passing its first operational year, Gravity4 is projected to do over nine-digits revenue by 2015 with 200 employees worldwide in 7 countries and 10 acquisitions to date. 
About Gravity4 
Gravity4 is the world's first High-Frequency Marketing OS integrated on one platform. Automation, Simplicity, and Design have been core ingredients in all of the technology within the Gravity4 Marketing Cloud. 
From day one, the Company's goal has been to simplify marketing by humanizing the fundamental components behind it. Gravity4 offers a full suite of enterprise applications to aggregate social, web, email, mobile, CRM, search, and location data in real-time for free. This offering allows marketers to save millions of dollars annually and enhance automation across all digital consumer touch-points. 
Gravity4 is a global software-advertising company headquartered in San Francisco, CA with offices in Chicago, New York, Miami, Bermuda, Dublin, Sao Paulo, Copenhagen, Belo Horizonte, Istanbul, Toronto, Sydney, Bogota, and Uppsala. 
Make Your Brand Limitless.(TM) 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/former-managing-director-of-radiumone-to-become-gravity4s-managing-director-of-northern-europe-300140189.html 
SOURCE Gravity4
